title: Re-enable REBALANCELEADERS for 5.1
description: The rebalanceleaders command is disabled for 5.0 to allow more "baking time". This ticket is to re-enable it (just uncomment it in collections api handling) and merge SOLR-6691 into 5.1 after 5.0 has been cut.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1647849 from Erick Erickson in branch 'dev/trunk'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1647849 ]

SOLR-6860: Re-enable REBALANCELEADERS for 5.1. going to let this bake in trunk only until 5.0 is cut
